i32 Rotate_Image ( ptr_t  imageptr,
u32  ncols,
u32  nrows,
i32  bpp,
i32  rotation 
)

Routine to rotate an image in the specified angle. This calls the aproproate routine depending on the image datatype (bpp parameter)

Parameters:
[in] imptr image buffer pointer
[in] ncols number of image columns
[in] nrows number of image rows
[in] bpp bits per pixels in image (16, 32 or -32(float)) ,[in] rotation desired rotation angle (90, 180 or 270 degrees only)
